mmud.rest.services

Class PrivateBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmud.rest.services.PrivateBean

  • @Path(value="/private")
public class PrivateBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all rest calls that are available to a specific character, with authentication and authorization. You can find them at /karchangame/resources/private.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_MAILS
      Indicates that only 20 mails may be retrieved per time (basically a page).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrivateBean()

      • getEntityManager

        protected javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        Returns the entity manager of Hibernate/JPA. This is defined in build/web/WEB-INF/classes/META-INF/persistence.xml.
        Returns:
        EntityManager

      • listMail

        @GET
@Path(value="{name}/mail")
@Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public java.util.List<PrivateMail> listMail(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                     @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                     java.lang.Integer offset,
                                                     @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                     java.lang.String lok)
        Returns a List of your mail, with a maximum of 20 mails and an offset for paging.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        offset - the offset, default is 0 if not provided.
        Returns:
        a List of (max 20 by default) mails.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException -
        • UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed.
        • BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.
        See Also:
        MAX_MAILS

      • hasNewMail

        @GET
@Path(value="{name}/newmail")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response hasNewMail(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                     @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                     java.lang.String lok)
        Returns a boolean, indicating if you have new mail. (i.e. mail since you last checked)
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        Returns:
        Response.ok if everything is okay.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed. BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.

        name - the name of the

      • getMail

        @GET
@Path(value="{name}/mail/{id}")
@Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public PrivateMail getMail(@PathParam(value="name")
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                    java.lang.String lok,
                                    @PathParam(value="id")
                                    long id)
        Returns a single mail based by id. Can only retrieve mail destined for the user requesting the mail.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        id - the id of the mail to get
        Returns:
        A specific mail.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed. BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.

      • createMailItem

        @GET
@Path(value="{name}/mail/{id}/createMailItem/{item}")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createMailItem(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                         @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                         java.lang.String lok,
                                                         @PathParam(value="id")
                                                         long id,
                                                         @PathParam(value="item")
                                                         int itemDefinitionId)
        Creates an itemDefinitionId instance (and, if required, an itemDefinitionId definition) representing an in-game version of a single mail based by id.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        id - the id of the mail to get
        itemDefinitionId - the kind of itemDefinitionId that is to be made. It may be null, if there already is attached a item definition to the mail.
        Returns:
        Response.ok if everything is fine.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed. BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.
        See Also:
        Mail.ITEMS

      • deleteMail

        @DELETE
@Path(value="{name}/mail/{id}")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteMail(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                        java.lang.String lok,
                                                        @PathParam(value="id")
                                                        long id)
        Deletes a single mail based by id.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        id - the id of the mail to delete
        Returns:
        Response.ok() if all is well.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed. BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.

      • updateCharacterSheet

        @PUT
@Path(value="{name}/charactersheet")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateCharacterSheet(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                               @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                               java.lang.String lok,
                                                               PrivatePerson cinfo)
        Adds or updates your current character info.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the user
        lok - the session password
        cinfo - the object containing the new stuff to update.
        Returns:
        Response.ok if everything is okay.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed. BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.

      • updateFamilyvalues

        @PUT
@Path(value="{name}/charactersheet/familyvalues/{toname}/{description}")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateFamilyvalues(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                             java.lang.String name,
                                                             @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                             java.lang.String lok,
                                                             @PathParam(value="toname")
                                                             java.lang.String toname,
                                                             @PathParam(value="description")
                                                             java.lang.Integer description)
        Add or updates some family values from your family tree.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        toname - the name of the user you are related to
        description - the description of the family relation, for example "mother".
        Returns:
        Response.ok if everything's okay.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed. BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.
